title: Haloween event? (need help)
body: Don't know if this is where i should put this, and I believe i already posted this question but cant find it, when is the Halloween event and will the devil teemo skin be available? how much will it cost? and when will the event end?

replies.body: Hey, I don't have any info on this.  :(  You'll want to bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should anything come up!
